video.title: Don't play fast and loose with the truth on your resume
video.summary:
TJ Walker offers his analysis on the ramifications of lying on your resume.
Scandal hit Duke University recently when it was discovered that one of their top scientists fabricated part of his resume throwing years of research and grants up in the air.

video.title: How will Senator Robert Byrd be remembered?- Media Training, Presentation Training
video.summary:
Robert C. Byrd, 92, a West Virginia Democrat and the longest-serving member of Congress, died early this morning at Inova Fairfax Hospital.
TJ Walker offers his analysis of how we should remember Byrd as speaker and what lessons we can learn from him.

video.title: E-books are here to stay. Amazon announces e-books outsell hardbacks- media training
video.summary:
TJ Walker takes a look at the announcement made by Amazon that it has sold more e-books last year than hardbacks.
Even with this development Walker stresses that ideas are the one commodity that will never go out of style.
